gacha.title: GachaMaster

fishing.title: Fishing Cove
fishing.movementHelp: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move. On mobile, use the D-pad.
fishing.fishingHelp: Walk to the water's edge (sand tiles). When facing the water, press SPACE or E to cast your line.
fishing.catchingHelp: Wait for a fish to bite. When you see "!" appear, quickly press SPACE/E to catch it! Rarer fish require faster reactions.
fishing.catchFishToTrade: Catch some fish to trade them here!
fishing.duplicateSession: Disconnected: You opened fishing in another tab
fishing.dailyLimitReached: Daily autofish limit reached! Resets at midnight.
fishing.softCapTooltip: Daily soft cap reached - rewards reduced by 50%

challengeDescriptions.streak_5: Catch 5 fish in a row without missing
challengeDescriptions.streak_10: Catch 10 fish in a row without missing
challengeDescriptions.streak_20: Catch 20 fish in a row without missing

fishing.maxPrestigeDesc: You have mastered the art of fishing.

captcha.verifyingRequest: Please wait while we verify your request...

captcha.helpsVerify: This helps us verify you're human

captcha.challengeExpired: Challenge expired. Please close and try again.
captcha.verificationFailed2: Verification failed. Please try again or contact support.

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Manage your gacha game

descriptions.dashboard: Overview of game statistics, quick actions, and system health
descriptions.users: Manage user accounts, points, and permissions
descriptions.characters: Add, edit, and organize characters in your gacha pool
descriptions.banners: Create and manage gacha banners with custom rates
descriptions.coupons: Create promotional codes and track redemptions
descriptions.rarities: Configure drop rates and visual styles for rarities
descriptions.security: Monitor risks, manage restrictions, and review appeals

admin.name: Name
admin.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?
admin.confirmDeleteCharacter: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
admin.deleteCharacterMessage: This will permanently delete "{{name}}". This action cannot be undone.
admin.confirmDeleteBanner: Are you sure you want to delete this banner?
admin.deleteBannerMessage: This will permanently delete "{{name}}". This action cannot be undone.
admin.confirmDeleteCoupon: Are you sure you want to delete this coupon?
admin.deleteCouponMessage: This will permanently delete coupon "{{code}}". This action cannot be undone.
admin.selectImage: Please select an image or video file

bannerForm.costHint: Standard pull = 100 points, this banner = {{cost}} points
bannerForm.rateHint: Higher value increases the chance of getting banner characters
bannerForm.bannerCharactersHint: Select characters that are featured in this banner

couponForm.couponCodeHint: No spaces, only letters, numbers, and hyphens
couponForm.couponCodeTitle: Use only letters, numbers, and hyphens

security.title: Security Management
security.noAuditEvents: No audit events for this user
security.confirmResetWarnings: Are you sure you want to reset this user's warnings?
security.denialNotesRequired: Notes are required when denying an appeal (min 10 chars)
security.confirmChangesText: You are about to modify security settings. These changes will take effect immediately and may affect user experience.
security.rateLimitNote: Note: Changes to rate limit WINDOW values (time periods) require a server restart to take effect. MAX values update within 60 seconds.
security.propagationNote: Note: Rate limit and lockout changes may take up to 60 seconds to propagate across all servers.
security.autoEnforcementDesc: These are restrictions automatically applied by the system based on risk scores and suspicious behavior detection.
security.decayDescription: Periodically decay risk scores to allow users to recover from false positives and reward good behavior over time.
security.decayConfirmText: This will reduce risk scores for {{count}} user(s) with scores ≥5 by {{percent}}%.
security.noIpCollisions: No other users found with the same IP
security.ipCollisionNote: IP collisions may indicate ban evasion or shared networks (VPN, school, workplace). Review audit logs and account creation dates for suspicious patterns.
security.confirmClearDevices: Clear all device fingerprints for this user? They will need to re-authenticate on their devices.
security.confirmResetRisk: Reset risk score to 0? This is typically used after reviewing a false positive.
security.permBanWarning: You are about to permanently ban user {{username}}. This action is severe and should only be used for serious violations.
security.passwordResetInfo: Reset the user's password and generate a temporary password. The user will be required to set a new password on their next login.
security.cannotResetAdminPassword: Cannot reset password for admin accounts.
security.passwordResetWarning: Are you sure you want to reset the password for "{{username}}"? This will generate a new temporary password and invalidate all existing sessions.

admin.createDiscountCodes: Create discount codes for your users
admin.createFirstBanner: Create your first banner to get started

rarities.title: Rarity Configuration
rarities.noRaritiesDesc: Add rarities to define drop rates and visual styles
rarities.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete
rarities.confirmReset: Reset all default rarities to their original values? This will not affect custom rarities.
rarities.cannotDeleteDefault: Cannot delete default rarities. You can only modify their settings.
rarities.minimumRateHint: Floor rate for banner pulls. Set to 0 to allow true 100% banners.
rarities.infoNormalization: Rates are normalized to sum to 100%. If you set one rarity to 100% but others have non-zero rates, the actual probability will be calculated as:
rarities.infoMinimumRate: Each rarity has a configurable Minimum Rate that acts as a floor for banner pulls. By default, Common has 35% minimum.
rarities.infoMinimumRateTip: Set to 0 to allow true 100% guaranteed banners.
rarities.infoMultiplier: Each banner has a rate multiplier (default 5×) that boosts rare+ rates, but each rarity has a cap that limits the maximum boost.
rarities.infoHowTo100Steps: Set Legendary's banner rate to 100%, all other rarities to 0%, and set Common's Minimum Rate to 0%.
rarities.warningText: Some rate pools don't sum to 100%. Rates will be normalized during rolls, which may produce unexpected probabilities.
rarities.guideRelativeWeightsDesc: If Legendary=100 and Common=60, Legendary gets 100/(100+60+...)=~50%. Set others to 0 for 100%.
rarities.guideSingleVsMultiDesc: Multi rates are usually slightly better (+2-5%) to reward bulk pulls.
rarities.guide100PercentDesc: Set that rarity's rate to any number, and set ALL other rarities to 0.
rarities.guideMinimumRateDesc: Use on Common to guarantee some "bad luck" (e.g., 35% minimum).
rarities.simulatorSingleNote: Probability of each rarity on a single pull (normalized to 100%):
rarities.simulatorMultiNote: Expected results from {{count}} pulls (rates normalized to 100%):
rarities.pityOnlyIfEligible: Only applies if pity eligible is checked
rarities.advancedNote: These settings control how banner rate multipliers affect this rarity. Most users can leave these at defaults.
rarities.multiplierScalingHint: 0 = immune to multiplier, 1 = normal, 2 = double effect
rarities.minimumRateFloor: Floor rate - never drops below this on banners
rarities.excludeFromPremium: Set to 0 to exclude from premium pool
rarities.presetCommonDesc: High standard rate, excluded from premium/pity pools
rarities.presetUncommonDesc: Moderate rate, slight banner boost, not pity eligible
rarities.presetRareDesc: Low rate, good premium rates, counts for pity guarantee
rarities.presetEpicDesc: Very rare, strong premium boost, pity eligible
rarities.presetLegendaryDesc: Extremely rare, maximum effects, pity eligible
rarities.tooltipStandardSingle: Base chance (%) when doing a single standard pull. Rates are normalized to 100% total.
rarities.tooltipStandardMulti: Base chance (%) when doing a 10× standard pull. Usually slightly better than single.
rarities.tooltipBannerSingle: Base chance (%) on banner single pulls. Banner multiplier can boost this.
rarities.tooltipBannerMulti: Base chance (%) on banner 10× pulls. Banner multiplier can boost this.
rarities.tooltipPremiumSingle: Chance (%) when using a premium ticket. Set to 0 to exclude from premium pool.
rarities.tooltipPremiumMulti: Chance (%) when using premium tickets in multi. Set to 0 to exclude.
rarities.tooltipPity: Chance (%) in the pity pool (guaranteed rare+ on 10th pull). Only for pity-eligible rarities.
rarities.tooltipCapSingle: Maximum rate (%) this rarity can reach after banner multiplier is applied (single pulls).
rarities.tooltipCapMulti: Maximum rate (%) this rarity can reach after banner multiplier is applied (multi pulls).
rarities.tooltipMultiplierScaling: How strongly the banner rate multiplier affects this rarity. 0 = immune, 2 = double effect.
rarities.tooltipMinimumRate: Floor rate (%) - this rarity will never drop below this rate on banners. Good for commons.
rarities.tooltipPityEligible: If checked, pulling this rarity counts as a "rare+" and resets the pity counter.
rarities.tooltipOrder: Priority order. Higher = rarer (checked first in roll calculations).

settings.title: Settings
settings.accountInfoDesc: View your account details and status
settings.emailDescription: Add your email to enable Google Sign-In linking and account recovery.
settings.usernameDescription: You can change your username once. Choose wisely!
settings.usernameWarning: This is a one-time change. You cannot change your username again after this.
settings.usernameAlreadyChanged: You have already used your one-time username change
settings.setPasswordDesc: Set a password to enable email login and unlock additional security features.
settings.setPasswordHint: Setting a password allows you to unlink Google and use email login as a backup.
settings.usernameTooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
settings.usernameSameAsCurrent: New username must be different from current
settings.googleAccountLinkedDesc: Your account is linked to a Google account. You can change or unlink it below.
settings.googleAccountNotLinkedDesc: Link a Google account to enable quick sign-in.
settings.selectNewGoogleAccount: Select the Google account you want to link:
settings.unlinkConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink your Google account? You will need to use your password to log in.
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Irreversible actions that will permanently affect your account.
settings.resetWarningTitle: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
settings.resetWarning1: All your characters will be deleted
settings.resetWarning2: All your points will be reset to 1000
settings.resetWarning3: All your tickets will be reset to 0
settings.resetWarning4: All your fish and fishing progress will be deleted
settings.resetWarning5: All your Dojo progress and upgrades will be reset
settings.resetKeep2: Your admin status and R18 preferences
settings.resetPasswordRequired: Password is required to reset account
settings.resetSuccess: Account reset successfully. Your progress has been cleared.

upload.uploadArea: Upload area. Click or drag files here to upload

specialization.title: Character Specialization
specialization.alreadyHasWarning: This character already has a specialization. Specializations are permanent.
specialization.permanentWarning: Choose carefully! Specialization is permanent and cannot be changed.
specialization.applyError: Failed to apply specialization. Please try again.
specialization.requiresFacility: Reach Level 10 and upgrade your Dojo to Warrior's Hall in the Upgrades section

strength.name: Path of Strength
strength.description: Boosts fishing timing window against fish

wisdom.name: Path of Wisdom
wisdom.bonus: +5% Gacha Luck, +25% Ticket Chance, -50% Dojo Income
wisdom.description: Better gacha odds and more tickets, but reduced dojo points

spirit.name: Path of Spirit
spirit.description: Enhanced dojo rewards, team synergy, and currency generation

onboarding.step1Desc: Discover, collect, and cherish characters from your favorite anime series. Every pull is a chance at something legendary!
onboarding.step2Desc: Claim your hourly reward to earn points. Use points to roll on banners and add characters to your collection.
onboarding.step3Desc: Featured banners have boosted rates for rare characters. Check the pity counter to track your luck!

fatePoints.title: Fate Points
fatePoints.selectorHint: Go to Profile to use your selector
fatePoints.pityBoostHint: Your pity has been boosted to 50%!
fatePoints.pityResetHint: Your pity has been reset to 50%
fatePoints.infoBox: Earn Fate Points by pulling on any banner. 1 pull = 1 FP. Your FP pool is shared globally and can be spent on any exchange. Weekly cap ensures fair progression.

exchangeOptions.pity_boost_desc: Advance pity progress to 50% of guaranteed threshold
exchangeOptions.banner_pity_reset_desc: Advance pity progress to 50% of guaranteed threshold

pity.sharedInfo: Standard pity progress is shared across all banners. Pulling on any banner advances these counters.
pity.featuredInfo: This progress is specific to this banner. If you pull a non-featured 5-star, your next 5-star on this banner is guaranteed to be featured.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.

upload.duplicateExplanation: These characters were uploaded but may be duplicates of existing ones.
